title: Did Goebbels say to the intellectuals, " Will they always surrender to the strong "?
subtitle: "Arguments must be rude, clear, coercive, and attracted to emotions and instincts, not thought," the supposed Nazi propaganda.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Nazi promoter Joseph Goebbels said, "Thinkers will never turn and they will always surrender to the strongest."
